alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:28PM EDT until August 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR WOOD AND NORTHWESTERN LUCAS COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Oregon to near Van Buren, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Numerous reports of tree and power-line damage have been received in Lucas County with these storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Fostoria, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, North Baltimore, Holland, Weston, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey and Bradner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across northwest Ohio. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
